summary: Diff implements autoplay attempt on mount, adds a play retry on the existing "Enter the Website" gesture, and adds console diagnostics around audio loading/play. However, the diff does not provide LLM-readable evidence that the runtime audio file is the user-provided "Soch_Na_Sake_FULL...." track, nor that duplicate audio variants were avoided/removed. Route-persistence via App.tsx cannot be confirmed from the provided diff snippets.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the provided audio track file "Soch_Na_Sake_FULL...." as the appâ€™s background music by adding it to `frontend/public/assets/` and ensuring the runtime audio source points to that exact file (or replace `/assets/background-music.mp3` while keeping that path working).
missing_requirements.reason: No new asset file was added (Added: 0), and the provider still points to `/assets/background-music.mp3`. The diff does not include evidence that `frontend/public/assets/background-music.mp3` was replaced with the user-provided "Soch_Na_Sake_FULL...." content or that a file with that exact name was added and referenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the audio element is created and used reliably across route changes via the existing `BackgroundAudioProvider` integration in `frontend/src/App.tsx` (so route navigation does not restart the track).
missing_requirements.reason: While `BackgroundAudioProvider` creates a single audio element in a mount-only effect, the diff does not show `frontend/src/App.tsx` (or any routing/root composition code) to confirm the provider is mounted above the router and is not remounted on route transitions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Avoid duplicate audio copies: include only one background music file in `frontend/public/assets/` for runtime use and remove/avoid adding multiple variants of the same track.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added/removed asset files (Added: 0, Removed: 0) and does not provide a verifiable listing of audio assets under `frontend/public/assets/` to confirm that only one source-of-truth music file ships and no duplicates exist.

hallucinated_features.description: Mute/unmute UI controls for background music (using Volume2/VolumeX icons) and related state management.
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements focus on autoplay + gesture retry + diagnostics and explicitly list a non-goal of adding a full music player UI. While this is not a full player, mute/unmute controls were not requested as part of REQ-5/6/7/8.
